description: To the south, the glow of lamps backlights the protective town walls, providing assurance that civilization is nearby.  Continuing northward, the snowy path climbs a small hill before disappearing into the darkness created by a stand of trees.  In the quiet of the night, the soft strain of tavern music drifts on the wind.

To the south, a comforting glimpse of the town wall assures that civilization is nearby and within easy reach.  Continuing northward, the snowy path climbs a small hill before disappearing back into the trees.
title: [Icemule Trace, Exterior]
